A '''goatherd''' from [[Meereen]] is a minor unnamed character who appears in the [[Season 4|fourth season]]. He is played by [[Philip Arditti]].
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 4]]===
The [[goatherd's son]] witnesses [[Drogon]] scorch the fields where his father's goats are grazing, before snatching one away in his talons. The goatherd brings a sack of charred remains before [[Daenerys Targaryen|Daenerys]] in her throne room atop the [[Great Pyramid]] of Meereen. She promises him he'll be repaid thrice the value of his lost livestock in compensation. Grateful for her generosity, he stumbles away backwards out of the throne room.<ref>"[[The Laws of Gods and Men]]"</ref>
